ECUAD 2013 Catalog App

UI/UX, Web, Front-end, iPad

At Steamclock, I worked on the 2013 Emily Carr Graduation Exhibition website and iPad app. Students can submit via a web form. Curators can review submissions and approve projects or request resubmission. The Show brand by Seven25 Design.
